name: Kashish...
greetingText: or kaju, or golu, or whatever but tbh I like aayat the most!
wishText: May this website always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Yee tum jiyo hajaro saal Many many blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do...
text4: I realised, Being a coder I wanted to do something
outroText: Today is the youngest you'll ever be again and you still have enough time to become all you wanted to be in life .. the best time to plant a tree may have been 20 years ago but, the second best time is right now.. bs aaj ke liye itna gyaan kafi he or hn logo ke kapde faadna band kro .. it's ur day enjoy !!!            Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or refresh, if you want to watch it again.
